    gchromVAR User’s Guide

    Caleb Lareau with Jacob Ulirsch and Erik Bao

    2017-12-23

    We created gchromVAR is an R package for performing enrichment analyses of genome-wide chromatin accessibility data with summary statistics (posterior-probability values) from common-variant associaitons.

    This vignette covers basic usage of chromVAR with standard inputs. For more detailed documentation covering different options for various inputs and additional applications, view the additional vignettes on the documentation website. For more description of the method and applications, please see the publication

    Loading the package

    Use library or require to load the package and useful additional packages.

    library(chromVAR)
library(gchromVAR)
library(BuenColors)
library(SummarizedExperiment)
library(BiocParallel)
set.seed(2017)
